response.overview: Six ordinary people reveal six extraordinary experiences. Two people, one instance. Surrender to each other, unleash erotic emotions, evoke the powers of passion, exposing the primal core of lust and sensuality.  Historically relevant for getting an official X Rating from the MPAA.
response.tagline: A chance meeting is the chance of a lifetime. Your dreams come true when you least expect.
response.title: Encounters Vol. 2: Chance Meeting
